thread.title: Here's Travis Scott Falling Through A Hole In The Stage At The Drake Show
thread.title_full: Here's Travis Scott Falling Through A Hole In The Stage At The Drake Show

author: Patrick Redford on The Concourse, shared by Patrick Redford to Deadspin
title: Here's Travis Scott Falling Through A Hole In The Stage At The Drake Show
text:
Go to permalink 
Former failed basketball player Drake just kicked off a huge tour last week, and heâ€™s playing the third of six shows in London tonight. He was joined by longtime Deadspin favorite Travis Scott, who promptly forgot about a bigass hole in the middle of the stage and fell straight into it. 
The hole houses a huge globe that comes out at some point, but Scott apparently broke it. 
Perhaps this was all a scheme to get everyone free tickets. Either way, the biter ate it. Recommended Stories
